# Lembaran
> Brankas Aksara Personal yang Berdikari (v2.8.0)

## Agent Context
- [.Jules/SPEC.md]: Aturan operasional dan spesifikasi Jules.
- [.Jules/MCP_CAPABILITIES.md]: Detail teknis alat MCP (Neon, Supabase, Stitch, dll).
- [.Jules/palette.md]: Brand identity and icon system documentation.

## Core Workspaces
- [packages/core]: Shared logic, encryption (AES-GCM/Argon2id), dan storage adapters.
- [packages/cli]: Interactive terminal interface (TUI).
- [packages/web]: Next.js application (Dashboard at /arsip).

## Key Files
- [packages/core/src/Arsip.ts]: Manajer enkripsi tingkat tinggi.
- [packages/core/src/Brankas.ts]: Mesin kriptografi.
- [AGENTS.md]: Panduan pengembangan utama.

## Concepts
- Berdikari: Local-first data sovereignty.
- Sentinel Security: Client-side encryption.
